thread.title: Ground News - Clermont police searching for ‘person of interest’ in Jewish school vandalism

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Clermont police searching for ‘person of interest’ in Jewish school vandalism
text:
Summary by Ground News Vandalism happened at Simchat Torah Beit Midrash on Dec. 10. Police released images of the person they are looking for in a news release. Anyone with information is urged to contact detectives at (352) 394-5588 or intel@clermontfl.org. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
WKMG Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Graham Holdings Clermont police searching for ‘person of interest’ in Jewish school vandalism Clermont police are searching for a person of interest after a Jewish school was vandalized earlier this month.Police said Thursday the vandalism happened at Simchat Torah Beit Midrash at 183 US Highway 27 on Dec. 10.Investigators released images of the person they are looking for in a news release, asking for help to locate him or her.Anyone with information on the person shown in the images is urged to contact detectives at (352) 394-5588 or i…
